abstract: Patricia Nakache, a Silicon Valley venture capitalist, is betting on start-ups that charge for Craigslist-type listings.

lead_paragraph: UPDATED 3:30 p.m.: Added revenue and net income for LoopNet.UPDATED 11/12 2:55 p.m. : Added clarification on screening process for caregivers on Care.com.

headline.main: Paying for Ads When Craigslist Is Free
